RelatedSentence: The Saskatchewan Teachers ' Federation ( STF ) and the Government - Trustee Bargaining Committee have reached a tentative collective bargaining agreement .
The agreement deals with articles that are required by legislation to be bargained provincially by the committee and the STF .
